description:
This course explores an aspect of Postcolonial literature intensively; specific course topics vary from year to year. 

See the English Department's website at www.english.upenn.edu for a description of the current offerings.
name: TPCS: POSTCOLONIAL LIT: The Literature & Historiography of National Trauma: Partition & South Asia
